channel.title: Dictionary Data Type :: IT From Scratch
channel.description: Syntax Input my_cat = {'size': 'fat', 'color': 'gray', 'age': 17} print(my_cat['size']) print('My cat has ' + my_cat['color'] + ' fur.') Output fat My cat has gray fur Input spam = {12345: 'Luggage Combination', 42: 'The Answer'} print(spam[12345]) print(spam[42]) print(spam[0]) Output Luggage Combination The Answer Traceback (most recent call last): File "<py-input-0>", line 1, in <module> KeyError: 0 Returning Values | values() Input
